name: Pusheen with Personality
description:
The Pusheen's personality is based on the OCEAN or Big 5 Personality Model.

O: Openness to Experience

High values indicate inventiveness or curiousness, while low values indicate consistency or cautiousness.

C: Conscientiousness

High values indicate efficiency and organization, while low values indicate extravagance or carelessness.

E: Extraversion

High values indicate outgoingness or being full of energy, while low values indicate a preference for solitary activities and reservedness.

A: Agreeableness

High values indicate friendliness and compassion, while low values indicate criticalness and rationality.

N: Neuroticism

High values indicate sensitivity and nervousness, while low values indicate resilience and confidence.
